TopicTitle: help please... bug with the ASAP-69 form Kosmos pack

Articles.Content: I've got a little bug with the Kosmos pack, the ASAP-69 (docking port) have the lazor system docking cam code in it, but the gui don't show it. I fix the bug by deleting the animation code (the ASAP-69 is animated), then the gui show it. I solved the bug, but the docking port is no longer animated. If somebody can help me, please explain me why it's don't work.
